name: リーディングチュウ太 Readability Enhancer
description: Changes the colour and underline style of hyperlinks within the stories, to make the links blend in with the text. Instead, when you hover the mouse over the link it lights up in a non-intrusive colour (enough to see that it is a link, but not so much that it is distracting from normal reading of the text).
additional_info: Feel free to replace the word "teal" with whatever other css colour you prefer. I couldn't decide what colour would be best, just that bold bright colours were annoying. ^^
